groups.GroupsApp.name: GroupsApp
groups.GroupsApp.doc: This class provides access to Google Groups information. It can be used to query information such as a group's email address, or the list of groups in which the user is a direct member.

method.name: getGroupByEmail
method.doc: Retrieves the group having the specified email address.

argument.name: email
argument.doc: the email address of the group to retrieve

method.name: getGroups
method.doc: Retrieves all the groups of which you are a direct member.

groups.Group.name: Group
groups.Group.doc: A group object whose members and those members' roles within the group can be queried.

method.name: getGroups
method.doc: Retrieves the direct child groups of the group.

method.name: getRole
method.doc: Retrieves a user's role in the context of the group.

method.name: getRole
method.doc: Retrieves a user's role in the context of the group.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: the user whose role to retrieve

method.name: getUsers
method.doc: Retrieves the direct members of the group that have a known corresponding Google account.

method.name: hasGroup
method.doc: Tests if a group is a direct member of this group.

argument.name: group
argument.doc: the group whose membership to test

method.name: hasGroup
method.doc: Tests if a group is a direct member of this group.

method.name: hasUser
method.doc: Tests if a user is a direct member of the group.

method.name: hasUser
method.doc: Tests if a user is a direct member of the group.

argument.name: user
argument.doc: the user whose membership to test

groups.Role.name: Role
groups.Role.doc: Possible roles of a user within a group, such as owner or ordinary member. Users subscribed to a group have exactly one role within the context of that group.

property.name: MEMBER
property.doc: A user who is a member of this group but is neither an owner nor a manager.

property.name: INVITED
property.doc: A user who has been invited to join a group by an owner or manager of the group but who has not yet accepted the invitation.

property.name: PENDING
property.doc: A user who has requested to join a group but who has not yet been approved by an owner or manager.
